DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective observational clinical multicentric study in ICU with acute renal failure requiring renal replacement therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Bundle Evaluation in Extra Renal Epuration, Incidence of Thrombosis
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective before / after observational clinical multicentric study on ICU acute kidney injury during renal replacement therapy. Evaluation of incidence and exposure to hemofilter clotting. The after phase will consist in medical measures (help for prescription) and paramedical measures (stop the filtration flow during the patient's mobilization).
DOC.criteria: Adult (age > 18 years) Renal replacement therapy (continuous veinoveinous hemofiltration or continuous veinoveinous hemodiafiltration) Consent of patients Use citrate anticoagulation Age below 18 years
